title.en: Short Prayer to Shabkar’s Various Incarnations

text.en: Countless aeons ago,
text.en-trans: kalpa pak tu mepé ngön rol né

text.en: You swiftly attained perfect enlightenment,
text.en-trans: nyurdu ngönpar dzokpar sangye té

text.en: And in order to benefit beings and the Victorious One’s teachings,
text.en-trans: gyalwé ten dang dro la penpé chir

text.en: Manifested in various forms, as appropriate, for beings’ sake.
text.en-trans: gang la gang dul kur ten dro dön dzé

text.en: At the time of the Buddha you were Ārya Avalokiteśvara,
text.en-trans: sangye dü su pakpa chenrezik

text.en: In the land of India you were the sublime Mañjuśrīmitra,
text.en-trans: gyagar yul du jampal shenyen chok

text.en: In the heart of Tibet you were Drenpa Namkha,1
text.en-trans: böyul ü su drenpa namkhar gyur

text.en: In the Kagyü tradition you were Milarepa himself,
text.en-trans: kagyü ten la mi la repa ngö

text.en: During the Kadam era you were the glorious Gyalse Tokme,2
text.en-trans: kadam dü su gyalsé tokmé pal

text.en: In the Ganden tradition you were the noble Lodrö Gyaltsen,3
text.en-trans: ganden ten la lodrö gyaltsen jé

text.en: For followers of nonsectarianism, you manifested as Thangtong Gyalpo.
text.en-trans: rimé dro ngor tangtong gyalpor trul

text.en: Now, at the present time, you are Shabkar, protector of beings.
text.en-trans: danté dü dir dro gön zhab karwa

text.en: In future, in Abhirati and other pure-lands of the five families,
text.en-trans: ma ong ngönga lasok rik nga yi

text.en: You will appear as the foremost heir
text.en-trans: zhing du rik kyi dakpo dé dak gi

text.en: Of each of the lords of buddha families,
text.en-trans: drung du sé kyi tuwo rerer gyur

text.en: And lead anyone with a connection to their chosen realm.
text.en-trans: dreltsé gang dö zhing du drenpar gyur

text.en: Throughout the three times of past, present and future,
text.en-trans: dé dang ma ong tanda dü sum du

text.en: You display various forms according to what is needed.
text.en-trans: gang la gang dul natsok kur ten né

text.en: Compassionate one, who serves the teachings and beings,
text.en-trans: ten dang dro dön dzepé tukjé chen

text.en: Lord of refuge, wish-fulfilling jewel, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: kyab gön yizhin norbu la solwa deb

text.en: A wish-granting jewel is hard to find even when sought
text.en-trans: chok chü zhingkham jewa trak gya ru

text.en: Through oceans of aeons in billions of realms of the ten directions,
text.en-trans: kalpa gyatsor tsal kyang nyé ka zhing

text.en: And its discovery is an event of vast significance.
text.en-trans: nyepa dön chen yizhin norbu lé

text.en: Yet to meet the guru is even greater still, the most excellent fortune!
text.en-trans: lhakpé lama jalwa kalpa zang

text.en: From now on, throughout all my lives to come,
text.en-trans: dak ni deng né tserab tamché du

text.en: May I never be separated from you, O protector,
text.en-trans: gönpo khyö dang namyang mindral zhing

text.en: May the nectar of your speech mature and liberate my mind,
text.en-trans: sung gi dütsi dak gyü mindrol né

text.en: And may the twofold benefit of self and other be spontaneously accomplished.
text.en-trans: rangzhen dön nyi lhün gyi drubpar shok
